name: WPMK Cache
author: Mubeen Khan

sections.description: WPMK Cache easiest and fastest WordPress Cache plugin. it is light-weight plugin you need to just install and active its simple option and it will work for you. it will help you in SEO.
sections.installation:
This will activate the WPMK Cache WordPress Plugin.

  1. Upload WPMK Cache to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Adjust options within ‘WPMK Cache’ admin menu

Once activated, please update your options via the WPMK Cache menu located within the left side of your wp-admin.
sections.faq:
How do I know if the plugin is working?

Once you have turned ‘On’ Frontend Caching from the WPMK Cache menu within your wp-admin, you simple can log out of WordPress and head on over to your frontend. Once there, just refresh the page, then look at the source code of your homepage. You will see at the very end of the source code just below the closing tag a comment indicating that WPMK Cache generated the page from cache.

Does WPMK Cache cache the wp-admin backend?

No. WPMK Cache does not cache the wp-admin backend. In fact, WPMK Cache doesnt even serve cached files to the admin.
